title: Orbs of Chaos and Light, and the tokens as well!
body: So, I've been spending all my Chaos Tokens on Orbs, and (somehow) managed to get a whopping 700 bonus tokens from my "last" Orb. It got me wondering, what's the highest amount of tokens that you can receive from an Orb. So, tell everyone what your experiences with the Orbs and bonus Tokens is, we'll see if we can nail down that cap (and just have a good "get-together" as well).

replies.body:
Wow thats a lot!
The highest I ever got was 100.

I had 3x more orbs than my friend, and I only ever got tokens from them, and even then way over half of them where nothing. 
Meanwhile he got 8 gemstones over the event...

But yet again, I am not known for my overwhelming luck...
